archimate:ApplicationInterface.name: Reccomendation Engines
archimate:ApplicationInterface.documentation: To be discussed further. Preferred approach TMF620 and TMF680, potentially more TMF OpenAPIs (from range of APIs existing in BSS/oSS) - e.g. customer information, product inventory (e.g. TMF 620,629, 637, 633, 638 , 658, 671,680, 683, Campaigns, Search). Potentially external recommendation engine will use data from BSS/OSS PostgreSQL staging database or Kafka. Potential target system - Google recommendation AI. To have product catalog which can integrate into enterprise search.
